content.rendered:
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

FAQ - Your Questions Answered

Can I get a quote online?

Yes, you can get a custom quote or just simply select Instant Quote – Book & Pay Alternatively select Custom Quote . Our team will provide you with a tailored quote ASAP & a payment secured link.

Can I book a same day courier over the phone?

Yes. Just call 07555 412 783 to speak to a knowledgeable team member. However, the quickest way is through our  Instant Quote – Book & Pay system.

Do you offer an overnight parcel delivery system?

Yes, we offer same-day as well next day overnight deliveries. If you require a custom delivery timeframe, please fill the form Custom Quote.

Can you make multiple drops on one booking?

Yes, for a multi drop service, please request a Custom Quote.

Can you book a “Wait and Return” courier service online?

Of course. You have this option on Instant Quote – Book & Pay, alternatively you can drop us a line.

Which method of payments do you accept?

We accept all major credit and debit cards securely online – our payment providers are Sum Up, Woo Commerce & PayPal. You can even “Buy Now, Pay Later” with PayPal or spread the cost in instalments!

Do I need to set up an account to book a same day courier?

No account is needed. Our online Book & Pay system allows you to get a quote & pay with just a few click.

Do you offer nationwide delivery?

Yes, we can deliver your parcels, pallets and important documents and packages across the UK mainland.

Should I pack my items?

Yes, please! We require all the goods to be packaged where possible. This will reduce the risk of damage while you goods are in transit.

Is this a domestic or commercial delivery service?

Both. It doesn’t matter who or where you are, we can deliver. At home, work or in transit somewhere, we come to you.

How long it takes to collect my item?

We aim to collect you item in under 60 minutes. This is usually dependent on weather & traffic conditions.

How can I give you my exact location?

We encourage you to provide the  “ What Three Words” for a lightning fast collection.

How do I know where my package is?

All our vehicles are tracked. We will keep you up to date. We can also send you a proof of delivery on request.

Can you leave my package with a neighbour?

Of course. We just need your specific request for approval.

How can you collect in 60 minutes?

We have partnered with the largest independent courier network I the UK. Having over 5000 courier partners, you can rest assured there’s almost always somebody close to you.

Do you transport other packages in the same time?

No. We only deliver from “A to B” directly. Only your goods will be in the vehicle.

What goods can you deliver?

At Interlink Logistics, we work closely with every customer, taking time to understand your individual needs, organize ourselves around your requirements and provide the right pick and pack services that include – same day delivery services, overnight or next-day delivery, freight services and urgent delivery from envelopes to large, fragile and palleted loads all at a fair cost

Why should I use you?

You want a reliable company with a good reputation for providing excellent customer service.

We know the importance of finding a courier company that you can trust to handle your deliveries, whether they’re time-sensitive documents or high-value items

.-Save time and money with fast courier services that are reliable and affordable.

– Rest easy knowing your packages are fully insured during transit.

– Choose from various vehicles to meet your specific needs, large or small.

– Enjoy peace of mind knowing your shipments will be handled quickly and efficiently.

– Book & Pay instantly.

Do you offer a large parcel delivery service?

Unlike a traditional courier company, we can deliver almost any parcel size.

.Do you offer a door-to-door delivery service with pick-up included?

All our services include free pick-up. Our deliveries are door to door however for very large / heavy items we only deliver to the ground floor of your address.

Is there a weight limit to send packages through a courier service?

No, there is no limit.(as long as there is a fork lift on both ends or if it can be hand-balled). We try to deliver any package regardless of size and weight.

What type of next day delivery services do you offer?

Our standard service is 24/7 delivery. If you require your package to be delivered sooner, you can request a Timed-Delivery Service such as “Special Delivery by 1 PM”. We also offer a premium weekend delivery service.

Why Are You So Cheap?

We focus on what it matters. Your packed being delivered. We can provide the most competitive prices on the market because we optimize the costs like no others. We work remotely. No big warehouse – our vehicles are always on the road to minimize “empty mileage” as much as possible. No fancy offices – no massive bills related.

Can we deliver and pick up parcels internationally?

We operate in UK mainland only.

How can I maximize the chances of a smooth delivery?

Please clearly mention as many details as possible. sender & receiver name, address, contact number, and load content (type, size weigh, characteristics etc.). Please inform the recipient of the expected delivery date and time.

Will a package be delivered if nobody is there to accept it?

No. We need your explicit request / consent to do this.

What is the refund policy for booked services?

Please see Terms and Conditions & Charges sections on the footer of this page.

You question not answered here?

Drop us a line
